abstracts.cdata!:
By relying on a program of development
            policy loans from International Bank for Reconstruction and
            Development (IBRD), Mauritius was able to accelerate
            much-needed and difficult economic reforms, boosting growth
            and averting the worst impacts of the global economic downtown.
